
{{alias}}( z )
    Returns the absolute value and phase of a double-precision complex
    floating-point number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    z: Complex128
        Complex number.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Absolute value and phase, respectively.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( new {{alias:@stdlib/complex/float64}}( 5.0, 3.0 ) )
    [ ~5.83, ~0.5404 ]

    See Also
    --------
